name: Spring Festival in Gensokyo
description:
This game is made in 3 days for Touhou Game Jam 5.

Theme

The date of the Chinese Spring Festival (Lunar New Year) is very close to this event, therefore I choose it as the theme and include Touhou characters originated in Chinese legends (Meiling, Seiga, Junko and Yachie).

Playing with fireworks is a tradition of the Spring Festival. In the official fanbook The Grimoire of Usami (秘封倶楽部異界撮影記録), characters use Danmaku to imitate fireworks. I think it is an interesting idea and use it here.

Background

Spring Festival (Lunar New Year) is coming. Three Youkai from China, Meiling, Seiga and Junko decide to celebrate the festival by hosting a fireworks show -- of course, with their Danmaku.

People make bets during the show, guessing who will be the master of fireworks, providing the most splendid performance.

Apparently, Reimu will not miss this opportunity to make money.

However, holding the same intention, Yachie Kicchou from Animal Realm comes to Gensokyo. There will be only one winner in the gamble. 

Game Objective

Control Reimu to earn more money than Yachie at the end of the festival.

Source Code

https://github.com/Chaosinism/thjam5

Tools

Engine - Godot

Graphics - Clip Studio Paint, GIMP, Texture Generator

Music - LMMS

Fonts - VT323
